home.title: PIMMS | Deep links to boost your conversions on LinkedIn
home.description: Stop losing leads with traditional links. Deep links open your prospecting content in the right mobile apps, driving more conversion and growth. Works for LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok, etc.

youtube.title: PIMMS | Deep links to boost your subscribers on YouTube
youtube.description: Stop losing subscribers with traditional links. Deep links open your videos in the official YouTube app, driving more subscribers and growth. Works for LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok, etc.
